description: Complete system overview documenting the core WhatsApp automation architecture, workflow orchestration, and component interactions
Detailed documentation of the core workflow algorithms for WhatsApp account setup, branding, linking, and message sending, including parallel execution strategies and rate limiting
Comprehensive documentation of device management implementation across different environments (BlueStacks, MoreLogin, cloud), including ADB interaction patterns and device state management
Documentation of data flow between components, including SMS verification, OCR processing, database interactions, and message handling pipelines
Documentation of service layer interactions between WhatsApp, SMS, device management, and database services, including error handling and retry mechanisms
